profile.name: Aria Desires
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at axo.dev | Remote Developer with a passion for Rust and systems programming
profile.summary: Highly motivated developer with expertise in Rust, Python, and systems programming. Proven track record of building and maintaining libraries, with a strong focus on robust error handling and database optimization.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at axo.dev
description: Designed and implemented multiple Rust libraries for database sharding and optimization.
Developed and maintained the axo.dev codebase, ensuring scalability and reliability.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed and maintained multiple Python projects, including a popular linter and code formatter.
Contributed to open-source projects, such as libSQL and Ruff.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained the libSQL fork of SQLite, ensuring its stability and security.
Contributed to the development of new features and bug fixes.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed multiple Rust projects, including a popular crate for database optimization.
Collaborated with clients to deliver high-quality software solutions.
